com.netscape.cms.servlet.admin

Class AuthAdminServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.netscape.cms.servlet.admin.AdminServlet
          • com.netscape.cms.servlet.admin.AuthAdminServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class AuthAdminServlet
extends AdminServlet
    A class representing an administration servlet for the Authentication Management subsystem. This servlet is responsible to serve configuration requests for the Auths Management subsystem.
    Version:
    $Revision$, $Date$
